import MethodEndpoint from '@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint';
import ParamsDetails from '@theme/ParamsDetails';
import RequestSchema from '@theme/RequestSchema';

import OperationTabs from '@theme/OperationTabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';
import Heading from '@theme/Heading';

<Heading
  as={'h1'}
  className={'openapi__heading'}
  children={'getApiV1Projects:username:slug'}
></Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={'get'}
  path={'/api/v1/projects/{username}/{slug}'}
  context={'endpoint'}
></MethodEndpoint>

Get a specific project by username and slug

<Heading
  id={'request'}
  as={'h2'}
  className={'openapi-tabs__heading'}
  children={'Request'}
></Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[
    {
      schema: { type: 'string' },
      in: 'path',
      name: 'username',
      required: true,
    },
    { schema: { type: 'string' }, in: 'path', name: 'slug', required: true },
  ]}
></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema title={'Body'} body={undefined}></RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{
    '200': {
      description: 'Project details',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: {
              id: { type: 'string', example: 'proj-123' },
              slug: { type: 'string', example: 'my-novel' },
              title: { type: 'string', example: 'My Novel' },
              description: {
                type: ['string', 'null'],
                example: 'A thrilling adventure story',
              },
              username: { type: 'string', example: 'johndoe' },
              createdDate: {
                type: 'string',
                format: 'date-time',
                example: '2023-01-01T00:00:00.000Z',
              },
              updatedDate: {
                type: 'string',
                format: 'date-time',
                example: '2023-01-01T00:00:00.000Z',
              },
            },
            required: [
              'id',
              'slug',
              'title',
              'username',
              'createdDate',
              'updatedDate',
            ],
            title: 'Project',
          },
        },
      },
    },
    '401': {
      description: 'Not authenticated',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: {
              error: { type: 'string', example: 'An error occurred' },
            },
            required: ['error'],
            title: 'ErrorResponse',
          },
        },
      },
    },
    '403': {
      description: 'Access denied',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: {
              error: { type: 'string', example: 'An error occurred' },
            },
            required: ['error'],
            title: 'ErrorResponse',
          },
        },
      },
    },
    '404': {
      description: 'Project not found',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: {
              error: { type: 'string', example: 'An error occurred' },
            },
            required: ['error'],
            title: 'ErrorResponse',
          },
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></StatusCodes>
